overview:
Martin Klosi, CEO at Witnez.com.

Martin graduated with a B.S. from UC Berkeley in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. He has previously worked as a software developer at OnLive in Palo Alto, an online gaming platform. Currently Martin lives in San Francisco working as a software developer for Sugar Inc., a leader in original media content.

Martin is also a member of the A.I. and soft computing group at UC Berkeley and has done research in text and natural language processing. Martin’s forte is undoubtedly Java, but he also has extensive experience designing and managing database systems, mainly PostgreSQL and MySQL. Martin has worked with web technologies like Ruby on Rails and Groovy on Grails, Struts, Tiles and Hibernate.
